abstract: Verizon Wireless essentially tells Congress: please don’t make Apple sell us the iPhone because we want to have the next cool phone and keep it from AT&T.
snippet: Verizon Wireless essentially tells Congress: please don’t make Apple sell us the iPhone because we want to have the next cool phone and keep it from AT&T.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Wireless is defending AT&T’s right to keep the iPhone to itself.

headline.main: Verizon Defends Exclusive Handsets, Except for Small Carriers
